def max_subarray(m):
    max_ending_here = max_so_far = 0
    for x in m:
        max_ending_here = max(0, max_ending_here + x)
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, max_ending_here)
    print max_so_far
for _ in range(int(raw_input())):
    n,x=map(int,raw_input().split())
    m=map(int,raw_input().split())
    m=[a-x for a in m]
    max_subarray(m)
